courses.title: Skiing Basics - Equipment & Preparation
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of skiing equipment selection, proper fitting, and pre-skiing preparation to build a solid foundation for beginners.
learning_objectives: Understand the basic components of skiing equipment

courses.title: Basic Stance & Balance Control
courses.description: Master the correct skiing stance and learn how to maintain balance on snow, which is the foundation of skiing technique.
learning_objectives: Learn to maintain balance on snow
Understand the importance of center of gravity control

courses.title: Straight Skiing & Braking Techniques
courses.description: Learn basic straight skiing techniques and the most important braking methods to ensure skiing safety.

courses.title: Basic Turning Techniques
courses.description: Learn the fundamental principles and techniques of skiing turns, including wedge turns and stem turns.
learning_objectives: Understand the basic principles of turning

courses.title: Parallel Turn Progression
courses.description: Transition from wedge turns to parallel turns, learning more advanced turning techniques.

courses.title: Speed Control & Rhythm
courses.description: Learn speed control techniques on different slopes and snow conditions, mastering the rhythm of skiing.
learning_objectives: Learn to control speed on different slopes

courses.title: Steep Slope Skiing Techniques
courses.description: Challenge steeper slopes and learn safe skiing techniques and strategies on steep terrain.

courses.title: Snow Condition Adaptation & Technique Adjustment
courses.description: Learn to adjust skiing techniques for different snow conditions (powder, hardpack, ice).
learning_objectives: Understand characteristics of different snow conditions

courses.title: Advanced Turns & Technique Combinations
courses.description: Learn more advanced turning techniques and movement combinations to elevate overall skiing level.

courses.title: Freestyle Skiing Introduction
courses.description: Introduction to freestyle skiing concepts and basic techniques, preparing for advanced skiing disciplines.
